dc_description_s: The following field definitions make up the shapefile attribute table called Master Plan of Policies Future General Land Use Map for City of Detroit adopted in 2009. This shapefile consists of all areas in the city defined with the Master Plan of Policies Future General Land Use Map. The Master Plan Future General Land Use Map has been amended since it was adopted. The layer was updated/amended on November 25, 2014.
dc_publisher_sm: City of Detroit Open Data Portal
dc_title_s: Current Master Plan and Future General Land Use: Detroit, Michigan, 2015
